ygData.subject: Re: Map File Specs

Hey,

The range of the values for the actual graphic data is 0-255 because
it is using single bytes for the array. Hope that helps.

-sean


--- In gladiator@y..., "Daniel Paul Hightower" <dph_of_rules@u...>
wrote:
> > 1 byte for number of frames (in the case of map files, that
should 
> always
> > be 1)
> > 1 byte for x size of frames
> > 1 byte for y size of frames
> > Then numframes * x * y bytes of actual graphics data (a bunch of 
> palette
> > indexes since it uses 8-bit color).
> 
> any idea on the range of those values for actual graphics data?
